document.full_text: u.s. bank jpmorgan  plans to nearly double the number of its employees in brazil to keep pace with an expanding financial market in latin america's largest economy, the financial times said on sunday.
document.title: jpmorgan aims to double headcount in brazil-report
lines_and_colors: u.s. bank jpmorgan  plans to nearly double the number of its employees in brazil to keep pace with an expanding financial market in latin america's largest economy, the financial times said on sunday.
